contents.text: Welcome to Lattice, based in San Francisco, your partner to align, engage, and grow your employees.
For sales and product information, press 1.
To schedule a live product demo, press 1.
Thank you for choosing Lattice. Please hold while we connect you to our sales team for a live demo.

navigationGoals: I want to schedule a live demo of Lattice today.
I'd like to schedule a live demo to see how Lattice can help me manage my team's performance in my new civilian role.
I’d like to schedule a live product demo to explore Lattice’s API integration and real-time analytics features.
I’d like to arrange a live demonstration to see how Lattice works
I’d like to schedule a live demo of Lattice’s engagement and performance modules to evaluate them for my research team’s workflows.

contents.text: For pricing and licensing inquiries, press 2.
We appreciate your interest in our pricing options. Please hold while we connect you to a sales representative.

navigationGoals: I need to review Lattice's pricing plans and licensing options.
I need a quote on Lattice pricing and licensing for my small veteran-run nonprofit.
I need a detailed breakdown of Lattice’s per-user licensing tiers and any volume discount structures.
I need to know Lattice’s pricing and available license options
I need detailed pricing and academic licensing information for using Lattice in my physics department’s pilot program.

contents.text: Our technical support team will be with you shortly. Please hold the line.

navigationGoals: I need help troubleshooting a technical error in my account.
I'm having trouble logging into my Lattice account and need technical assistance.
Help me troubleshoot an OAuth token failure when calling Lattice’s employee engagement API endpoints.
I’m having trouble with the software and need technical help
I’m encountering an integration error with the Lattice API and require technical support to troubleshoot.

contents.text: For account and billing questions, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you with our account management team.

navigationGoals: I need clarification on a recent billing invoice.
I want to update my billing information and review my latest invoice.
Investigate and correct an overcharge on my Lattice subscription invoice for last billing cycle.
I have questions about my account billing and charges
I need assistance reviewing and updating my account’s billing details, specifically my current subscription invoice.
